AFFILIATETAGSETTING_SEARCH_WHERE.Statement: WHERE (@affiliate_name_like_escaped = '' OR w2_AffiliateTagSetting.affiliate_name LIKE '%' + @affiliate_name_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') -- アフィリエイト名 AND (@affiliate_kbn = '' OR w2_AffiliateTagSetting.affiliate_kbn = @affiliate_kbn) -- アフィリエイト区分 AND (@valid_flg = '' OR w2_AffiliateTagSetting.valid_flg = @valid_flg) -- 有効フラグ AND (@session_name1 = '' OR w2_AffiliateTagSetting.session_name1 = @session_name1) -- セッション変数名1 AND (@session_name2 = '' OR w2_AffiliateTagSetting.session_name2 = @session_name2) -- セッション変数名2
